originalText.text: Worst place in the whole new York city its tenants are all junkies its unsafe and staff are non reliable unprofessional and most importantly it's a very racial place where everyone is being judged no counselor has a casac T bedies just prior to normal education the director has no respect for any of her workers and she doesnt knoe anything on how to run a building not a good example for.good people that need the substantial resources to find great jobs such as the ease of work that she has. Unfortunately this is reality perfect sceem to make money out of homeless beaten down battered human beings with low self esteem and have no choice but to take the help since no one else would. They have rooms being rented on a contract lease form for $1000 each  and that's the equivalency to the price of a full studio in NYC RIP off and scam artist not a great place to reccomend someone but if your homeless hey go for it but this place is only for people who can't defend themselves and let the business owners take advantage and get rich off the poor.
